\section{Module hal.time.utils}

    \label{hal:time:utils}
\begin{alltt}
Parse, convert time formats 
\end{alltt}

  \subsection{Functions}

    \label{hal:time:utils:parse_hh_mm_ss}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.time \textit{(package)}!hal.time.utils \textit{(module)}!hal.time.utils.parse\_hh\_mm\_ss \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{parse\_hh\_mm\_ss}(\textit{string})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param string: str
    Hours, minutes and seconds in the form hh:mm:ss to parse
:return: datetime.time
    Time parsed
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:time:utils:get_seconds}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.time \textit{(package)}!hal.time.utils \textit{(module)}!hal.time.utils.get\_seconds \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{get\_seconds}(\textit{string})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param string: str
    Datetime in the form \%H:\%M:\%S
:return: int
    Seconds in time
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:time:utils:parse_hh_mm}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param string: str
    Hours and minutes in the form hh:mm to parse
:return: datetime.time
    Time parsed
\end{alltt}
